feed.title: GoDoxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.2
entry.content:
Fixed

  • OIDC: logout not working if user was denied access

Changed

  • Agents: loosen version checking to major version checking only
  • warn when version mismatch instead of error
  • Add update functionality to system agent install script
  • Shrunk agent binary size back to ~16MB

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Crashing when IP is blocked
  • ACL not caching properly
  • Reduced access log buffer size for stdout logging

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.4
entry.content:
New

  • ACL: FORCE_RESOLVE_COUNTRY environment variable to allows MaxMind database lookup even if previous non-geo-blocking rules already matched

Fixed

  • Notifications not being sent
  • MaxMind database being downloaded twice when it does not exist

Changes

  • Improved MaxMind database update mechanism

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.5
entry.content:
Changes

  • Fixed cloudflareRealIP middleware wasn't set to be recursive by default
  • Improved error message for route conflicts

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.6
entry.content:
Changes

  • Improved error message on route alias conflict (89d93dd8780bad6262ff955f11efddbb070724d4)
  • Removed some redundant debug logging (22a12d31164e7e1f2cdff5f2ace9d9c9e5cc68f1)

Fixes

  • Proxmox LXC idlesleep feature (27409abc246d36be3c9721a4e88075e92a80dbc3)
  • OIDC: token refresh not working when receiving multiple requests at a time from the same session (c5fd21552eb96af4358358f2f992e2993780adc1)
